sentences.en: Do you think Hippomenes deserved to win the race?
sentences.cn: 你认为希波墨涅斯应该（算）赢吗？

sentences.en: However, when he saw Atlanta come out of her house to run, Hippomenes changed his mind.
sentences.cn: 然而，当他看到亚特兰大从她的房子出来跑步的时候，希波墨涅斯改变了他的心意。

sentences.en: There was a man called Hippomenes who was amazed when he heard of Atlanta's rules.
sentences.cn: 希波墨涅斯听到亚特兰大规则时很惊讶。

trans.tran_cn: <希神>希波墨涅斯（在同美女Atalanta赛跑中获胜，因而得以娶她为妻）
trans.tran_en: the husband, in some traditions, of Atalanta
